name: Matano
headline: Cloud Native SIEM (alternative to Splunk/Elastic)
description:
Matano is a modern SIEM, built for cloud-first security teams. 

It replaces traditional SIEM databases like Splunk or Elastic with a cybersecurity platform built on top of a cost-effective Security Data Lake.

founders.name: Samrose Ahmed, Founder
founders.description: Hi I'm Samrose, a software engineer by background. I grew up in NYC, went to CMU, and worked at AWS for a few years before starting Matano. I'm especially interested in big data, cloud, and highly available systems. Outside of work, I'm an avid reader.

founders.name: Shaeq Ahmed, Founder
founders.description:
Hey! Shaeq is a software engineer who originally hails from New York and loves all things open source, security and big data. He quit his job 
crunching data for autonomous robots at Amazon to build Matano - an open-source SIEM alternative for security teams on AWS.

![](https://www.matano.dev/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fdesktop-grid.13176518.png&w=3840&q=75)![](https://www.matano.dev/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fmobile-grid.059f6fa8.png&w=1920&q=75)
# Modern Cloud Native SIEM
Reduce costs and help your existing team detect threats faster with Matano’s full-featured SIEM platform built on a security data lake.
Join the Waitlist
Join the Waitlist
![Unified Security Data Lake Icon](https://images.ctfassets.net/p30c3sx1she8/1Xzp4Md80K0xBeeYrQ7avg/3d3cd0845d04ac48fc2e7356bd550cf3/unified-security-data-lake.svg)
Unified Security Data Lake
Ingest and store all your security data into a scalable data lake. Matano automatically ingests data from all of your security and software products with hundreds of prebuilt integrations and parsers.
![Detect & Respond Faster Icon](https://images.ctfassets.net/p30c3sx1she8/3xyGXj9frcARYz3CBwgFNu/b94941cfa249194c8c5d1aa5ed0e11ee/detect-and-respond-faster.svg)
Detect & Respond Faster
Get started with Matano’s 800+ out-of-the box correlation rules tuned to your environment to detect and remediate threats in realtime.
![Search Experience Icon](https://images.ctfassets.net/p30c3sx1she8/5BGIiuH1mNtt2Bwv2QOqvD/ffda44eb1a67eaba43e9793a1cf53a26/search-experience.svg)
Search Experience
Easily search data and build detection rules across your data lake using a intuitive search language compatible with Splunk SPL. Modernize your SOC without retraining your workforce.
HOW IT WORKS?
## Analyze and Store All Your Data
Matano is a revolutionary SIEM built on a security data lake designed for petabyte scale analytics. 
![](https://www.matano.dev/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fp30c3sx1she8%2F5fJ3mWpclESJhu7rOcsoWY%2F6d507602b104f699bbef03b4c7bcb5b6%2Fhow-it-works.png&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://www.matano.dev/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fp30c3sx1she8%2F6dosujUhHjqFREqzN3fvJK%2F0d2d03bb144d924460d550ea6178bd9a%2Fhow-it-works-mobile.png&w=3840&q=75)
6x
reduction in total cost of ownership (TCO)
Cloud-native data lake scale on pure object storage with unlimited retention, and a predictable pricing model so you don’t have to compromise security visibility due to cost and scalability concerns.
1000+
pre-built parsers
Automatic integration with 1000+ data sources, normalized to a common schema (ECS) using pre-built parsers and enriched using context from threat intelligence feeds and the Security Graph. 
800+
detection rules
Over 800 out-of-the-box detection rules, spanning your entire environment from endpoint and network to cloud, including correlation rules detecting threats across multiple data sources.
[Learn more](https://www.matano.dev/</product>)
KEY FEATURES
## Get a quick overview of the platform
Respond proactively to security alerts, leveraging the tools that your teams are familiar with
Collect all your logs into a scalable data lake
Matano helps you ingest and normalize unstructured security logs into Snowflake and AWS for blazing fast search and analytics. Your data is always stored in S3 for unlimited retention at petabyte scale. Leverage hundreds of pre built connectors to ETL data from common security sources like Cloud, SaaS, Host, Network, and Identity logs.
Search and detect using SPL compatible query language
Quickly search your data lake for IOC’s and pivot across hundreds of common fields using the Elastic Common Schema (ECS). Use Matano’s Splunk compatible search language to slice and dice data into charts and visualizations for interactive threat hunts.
Contextualized alerts in realtime
Matano automatically pulls threat intelligence and asset context into a security graph and combines it with the data lake to deliver high fidelity alerts and help you focus on the threats that matter.
[Learn more](https://www.matano.dev/</product>)
![](https://www.matano.dev/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fdesktop-grid.13176518.png&w=3840&q=75)![](https://www.matano.dev/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fmobile-grid.059f6fa8.png&w=1920&q=75)
SOLUTIONS
## Explore Latest Solutions
Discover solutions and usecases for Matano.
[UsecaseSecurity Data LakePetabyte scale analytics on a cloud-native Big Data architecture. Retain ownership of years of data with true decoupled storage and compute and open integration with existing data platforms. Break down data siloes and leverage the data tooling your organization already uses.](https://www.matano.dev/</solutions/security-data-lake>)
[EcosystemMatano for SnowflakeOperationalize Snowflake for security analytics. Eliminate data siloes and seamlessly unify your business and security data with zero ETL. Optionally use your existing Snowflake compute with Matano using Bring Your Own Snowflake.](https://www.matano.dev/</solutions/matano-for-snowflake>)
[UsecaseSIEM AugmentationEnhance your enterprise's threat detection and response at a predictable cost with Matano's cloud-native SIEM built natively on a security data lake.](https://www.matano.dev/</solutions/cloud-security>)
[Matano ForCloud SecurityDetect and respond to threats across your cloud environments. Leverage integrated data collection and curated detection rules. Analyze, investigate, and respond across your entire security ecosystem, from cloud to endpoint and more.](https://www.matano.dev/</>)
[View All Solutions](https://www.matano.dev/</solutions>)
INTEGRATIONS
## Unlock the full potential of your data
Matano comes with out of the box integrations with hundreds of data sources.
[![](https://images.ctfassets.net/p30c3sx1she8/2D0f1AftF52tmvUVt0wK3L/a854eadeabed961d4887a10f5157b250/aws.svg)Amazon Web Services (AWS)Collect logs from AWS products. AWS is a public cloud vendor offering a suite of cloud computing services.](https://www.matano.dev/</integrations>)
[![](https://www.matano.dev/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fp30c3sx1she8%2F12KH6ss7DgbAEdSGp4vfqj%2F4bcfe20ddb9c1e75b2fd362dd15e253c%2FCS_Logo_2022_In-Line_All-Red_RGB__1_.png&w=3840&q=75)CrowdstrikeIngest logs from Crowdstrike products, including Falcon Data Replicator and SIEM connector. CrowdStrike provides an enterprise cloud-based endpoint security platform.](https://www.matano.dev/</integrations>)
[![](https://images.ctfassets.net/p30c3sx1she8/3KJ3RSHZzTRAilcmPlLmC4/3d6171b058aad6bc9dd42f57e6781c40/PaloAltoNetworks_2020_Logo-1.svg)Palo Alto NetworksPalo Alto Networks offers an enterprise cybersecurity platform that provides firewalls, threat detection and prevention tools, cloud security, network security, and more.](https://www.matano.dev/</integrations>)
[![](https://images.ctfassets.net/p30c3sx1she8/2KzTxPB6uKEMTnG45uU1Rl/61e5357aab9a506ed6f82d603c0aab48/Zscaler_logo-1.svg)ZscalerCollect logs from various Zscaler products. Zscaler is a cloud-based cybersecurity platform offering secure internet access and protection against online threats for organizations.](https://www.matano.dev/</integrations>)
[![](https://www.matano.dev/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fp30c3sx1she8%2F4wW4NAHannHN5QzIuxhpB8%2Fabe64dbf9138ca57ba9663b6a848951a%2FOkta_Wordmark_CMYK_Black.png&w=3840&q=75)OktaCollect logs and data from Okta. Okta is a cloud-based identity and access management (IAM) platform that provides secure access to an organization's applications, devices, and data.](https://www.matano.dev/</integrations>)
[![](https://images.ctfassets.net/p30c3sx1she8/3Wp9DDhDGbzffgKKJxv2Rf/7246d7a1d723e9ee6db6acd791a78576/office365.svg)Microsoft Office 365Collect Microsoft Office 365 activity logs. Office 365 is a subscription-based service that provides access to Microsoft Office software.](https://www.matano.dev/</integrations>)
[View All Integrations](https://www.matano.dev/</integrations>)

generated_description:
**Matano: The Cloud Native SIEM Revolutionizing Cybersecurity**

Founded in 2022 and operating out of Seattle, WA, Matano is making waves in the cybersecurity landscape as a cloud-native Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) platform. The company is part of Y Combinator's Batch W23, which lends it a stamp of credibility and innovation. 

### Mission
Matano's mission is ambitious yet straightforward: to simplify security analytics for cloud-first teams. By replacing traditional SIEM heavyweights like Splunk and Elastic with a more efficient, cost-effective solution, Matano aims to enhance the way organizations handle their cybersecurity posture.

### What They Do
Matano provides a unique cybersecurity platform built on a Security Data Lake, enabling organizations to aggregate and analyze vast amounts of security data effortlessly. The technology allows for:
- **Petabyte-scale analytics** without the astronomical costs typically associated with data storage.
- **Seamless integrations** with over a thousand data sources, utilizing pre-built parsers that normalize diverse data into a unified schema.
- A **rapid response framework** with over 800 out-of-the-box detection rules tailored to real-time threat identification and incident response.

Their platform is designed to reduce the total cost of ownership (TCO) by simplifying data management and improving threat detection across various environments, from cloud to endpoint security.

### Key Features
- **Unified Security Data Lake:** Centralizes and scales security data in a highly effective manner.
- **Rapid Detection and Response:** Readily deploy preconfigured correlation rules that enhance security operations.
- **Familiar Search Capabilities:** Leverage a search language compatible with tools like Splunk, minimizing the learning curve for security teams.

### Market Position
Matano is keenly positioned in the market under tags such as 'devsecops,' 'analytics,' 'open-source,' and 'cybersecurity.' It stands out as an innovative alternative for security teams looking to modernize their operations without the hefty price tag of traditional incumbents.

### Leadership and Team
With a compact team of two, Matano is backed by Group Partner Diana Hu, whose support likely helps steer the company as it navigates early-stage challenges in the competitive cybersecurity field. 

Overall, Matano is not just reshaping how organizations think about SIEM capabilities; they're redefining the economics of security data management, encouraging businesses to think twice before settling for outdated, costly solutions. If you’re in the market for streamlined security analytics, Matano is definitely worth exploring. 

For more information, check out their website [here](https://www.matano.dev).
